---
title: "Gallery"
lightbox: true
format:
  html:
    include-before-body: ../header.html
filters:
  - masonry
include-in-header:
  - text: |
      <style>
        /* Target the container that the extension creates */
        .masonry {
          margin: 0 auto;
        }

        /* Styling for your items */
        .grid-item {
          width: 200px;
          margin-bottom: 10px; /* Space between items vertically */
          background: #D26;
          border: 2px solid #333;
          border-color: hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.5);
          border-radius: 5px;
          overflow: hidden; /* Ensures image stays inside border */
        }
        
        /* Ensure images fill the card */
        .grid-item img {
          display: block;
          width: 100%;
          height: auto;
        }
      </style>
---
